Harga Emas Antam Naik Rp 9.000, Terbang Ke Rp 764.000 per Gram
01 Nov 2019, 03:09 by Ignacio Geordi Oswaldo


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Harga emas batangan milik PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) pada awal bulan ini terbang naik Rp 9.000 per gramnya. Emas Antam hari ini dijual Rp 764.000/gram.Demikian dikutip detikcom dari situs perdagangan Logam Mulia Antam, Jumat (1/11/2019).Harga buyback atau pembelian kembali emas Antam hari ini juga ikut meroket naik Rp 10.000 menuju level Rp 684.000/gram. Harga buyback ini berarti, jika Anda ingin menjual emas, maka Antam akan membelinya dengan harga tersebut.Harga emas batangan tersebut sudah termasuk PPh 22 sebesar 0,9%. Bila ingin mendapatkan potongan pajak lebih rendah, yaitu sebesar 0,45% maka bawa NPWP saat transaksi.Berikut rincian harga emas Antam hari ini:

Pecahan 1 gram Rp 764.000
Pecahan 5 gram Rp 3.640.000
Pecahan 10 gram Rp 7.215.000
Pecahan 25 gram Rp 17.930.000
Pecahan 50 gram Rp 35.785.000
Pecahan 100 gram Rp 71.500.000
Pecahan 250 gram Rp 178.500.000
Pecahan 500 gram Rp 356.800.000

Antam Gold Prices Rise Rp 9,000, Fly to Rp 764,000 per Gram
Nov 01 2019, 03:09 by Ignacio Geordi Oswaldo


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The price of gold bars owned by PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) earlier this month flew up to Rp 9,000 per gram. Today Antam's gold is sold at Rp. 764,000 / gram. As quoted by AFP from the Antam Precious Metals trading site, Friday (1/11/2019). . This buyback price means, if you want to sell gold, then Antam will buy it at that price. The price of the gold bar includes PPh 22 of 0.9%. If you want to get a lower tax cut, which is equal to 0.45%, then bring your NPWP during the transaction. Here are Antam's gold price details today:

Fraction of 1 gram IDR 764,000
5 gram fraction Rp 3,640,000
10 gram fraction of Rp. 7,215,000
The 25 gram fraction is Rp. 17,930,000
50 gram fraction of Rp. 35,785,000
100 gram fraction of Rp. 71,500,000
250 gram fraction Rp. 178,500,000
500 gram fraction of Rp 356,800,000
